description: Track and rollback AI code changes automatically. Perfect for AI-assisted coding scenarios.
viewsContainer.title: ReCode
view.historyView.name: Change History
config.title: ReCode
config.maxHistorySize.description: Maximum number of changes to keep
config.retentionDays.description: Number of days to retain change history (1-365)
config.protectedFiles.description: Glob patterns for protected files that trigger warnings on modification. Note: Files in .gitignore will not be monitored.
config.protectedFileAction.description: Action to take when a protected file is modified
config.timeline.maxNodes.description: Maximum number of nodes to display in timeline (10-500)
